summary:
Add the two house.
Location - east of Ivarstead.
Cottage for players. (1bed,No loading cell)
Fountain Basement for followers. (10bed,loading cell)
descriptionHtml:
Sorry,I'm not good at English.
[color=#ADD8E6][font=Tahoma][size=3][b]Location[/b][/size][/font][/color]
It'll add a house in near the Darkwater Pass.(east of Ivarstead)

[color=#ADD8E6][font=Tahoma][size=3][b]Features[/b][/size][/font][/color]
-You could live in two homes
[Cottage]
No loading cell.
Candle Light on/off.
one bed for player.

[Fountain Basement]
Loading cell.
ten bed for followers.

-There is a All Craft equipment except Wood Chopping Block.
Instead, 50 firewood in containers.

-Container for each item
Wepon,Armor,Potion,SoulGem,Alchemy,Ingot,AnimalPelt,Accessories,
SpellBook,EtcBook,Letter,Scrool,Foodstuff,CookedFood,Firewood,
FavoriteItem,TrashBasket(Respawn),Some free container.

-You can sit in some place outdoors.
Wall fance,Rock,Roof,Etc.

[color=#ADD8E6][font=Tahoma][size=3][b]Conflict[/b][/size][/font][/color]
This mod have changed the land.
If other mod location to compete,
You change the load order or remove my mod.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
DFB - Random Encounters
There is a DFB encount point near my mod.
Please allowed to fall the enemy from the cliff using a shout.
In my case,
After backup the DFB files, it was deleted encounter point using the CK.
